meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>order</kanji> of things is the <kanji>preface</kanji> to the entire <vocabulary>sequence</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>steps</vocabulary> we're planning on taking. So, just remember. The order is just the preface. It is what allows us to come up with a sequence.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
